name: Andrélon Special Shampoo Zilver Care
composition: ‎INGREDIЁNTEN: Aqua, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Chloride, Parfum, Cocos Nucifera Oil (Kokosolie), Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice Powder (Aloë Vera), Sine Adipe Lac, Cocos Nucifera Fruit (Kokos) Extract, Bambusa Vulgaris Shoot (Bamboe) Extract, Sodium Benzoate, Polyquaternium-10, Citric Acid, Disodium EDTA, Sodium Hydroxide, PPG-6, Coumarin, Linalool.
